title: #ICYMI: Pitching Physics with Ron Darling
description:
To break down the physics of a pitch, this week Chuck Nice and Gary O’Reilly welcome former New York Mets starting pitcher and 1986 World Series winner Ron Darling Jr. and astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson
Don’t miss an episode of Playing with Science. Subscribe to our channels on:
Apple Podcasts: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/playing-with-science/id1198280360?mt=2
GooglePlay Music: https://play.google.com/music/listen?u=0#/ps/Iimke5bwpoh2nb25swchmw6kzjq
SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/startalk_playing-with-science
Stitcher: http://www.stitcher.com/podcast/startalk/playing-with-science
TuneIn: http://www.tunein.com/playingwithscience
NOTE: StarTalk All-Access subscribers can watch or listen to this entire episode commercial-free. Find out more at https://www.startalkradio.net/startalk-all-access/
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
